name: Wymia
description:
Wymia

A short story-driven game inspired by the RPG Maker genre.

Synopsis

A story about a child's quest to rescue their mother's lives through helping others and being helped in return in a shabby town.

Disclaimer

Heavily rushed. Expect some bugs.

No music... yet. Didn't have enough time left in the jam for music unfortunately.

The Heartbeat theme did help inspire the game but I didn't follow the theme at all. That's that.

How to Play

Use WASD or arrow keys to move the player character.

Press E to interact with game objects when the prompt bubble is shown.

Press Space, Enter, or left click to advance the dialogue.

Press ESC to open the settings menu.

Credits

Basically Everything - fsnowdin

Made with Godot Engine 3.2.3 for the 30th Godot Wild Jam.
